metadata.subject: Liberty
Political science
metadata.title: Lettres sur la liberté politique, adressées à un membre de la chambre des communes d'Angleterre, sur son élection au nombre des membres dúne association de comté /
metadata.creator: Williams, David, 1738-1816.
Williams, David, 1738-1816
Brissot de Warville, J.-P. (Jacques-Pierre), 1754-1793
Pacot, Etienne
Roze-Croix, R. P. de., translator
metadata.publisher: A Liège : Imprimées ... aux dépens de la Société,
metadata.description: Translation of: Letters on political liberty, addressed to a member of the English House of Commons, on his being chosen into the committee of an associating county
Attributed to Brissot de Warville by Martin & Walter
Includes explanatory notes with some comparison to contemporary French history, politics and government
metadata.notes: Title page located on front cover. No table-of-contents pages found. No copyright page found. Worn, damaged and discolored pages and cover.
